page.title: 05MARYKIRK SCHOOL G.P. ROOM
page.content: The General Purpose Room (G.P. Room), which is the biggest room in the school, is used for gym, music, dinner, services and assembly. This room looks onto the tarmacadam playground at the front of the school where we play rounders and wally. It is situated along the corridor, past the boys' toilets and is at the opposite end of the school from the two classrooms. There are six lights hanging from the roof. At one end there is a large cupboard which stores gym equipment, the television set, the record player, the video recorder, the sewing machine and sewing materials.
